title: Stock Futures Waver Ahead of Fed Minutes
sub_head: Futures tied to tech-heavy Nasdaq-100 futures fall
body:
U.S. stock futures wobbled as investors awaited minutes from the Federal Reserveâ€™s recent policy meeting in the hope of gleaning fresh clues about plans to wean markets off pandemic-era stimulus measures.
Futures tied to the S&P 500 flicked between small gains and losses Wednesday, a day after the broad index pulled from a record high as technology firms fell. Futures for the tech-heavy Nasdaq-100 fell 0.3% Wednesday, while blue-chip Dow Jones Industrial Average futures were unchanged.
